name: Big Bang Racing
description:
Outrun players around the world in quick 4-player races, massive 100-player Tournaments, or take a break and relax by collecting treasures from casual 1-player adventure tracks. Create and share your own levels, upgrade your rides, and customize your characters with the swaggiest hats in the galaxy. Team up, climb the leaderboards and win glorious prices!

Features:

- Drive in millions of player created levels
- Ride with two badass vehicles – Dirtbike and Offroad Car
- Collect upgrades, treasures and fun new items
- Create and Share your own tracks
- Race against real players from all over the world
- Team up, beat other teams in Weekly Seasons and get awesome prizes
- Climb the ranks in global & local leaderboards
- Customize your character with cool hats

Hop on your ride, and join the most exciting race in the galaxy!
